title: Cape Cod National Seashore: Things To Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do         Nauset Light, Eastham   CLOSURES: Sections of the boardwalk at the Red Maple Swamp Trail have been closed due to structural deterioration and safety concerns. Check at Salt Pond Visitor Center for the current status of this trail, and for your safety, remain out of closed areas. ACTIVITIES: Cape Cod National Seashore offers a wide-range of activities from walking beaches and trails year round, to ranger-guided programs throughout the year. There are also businesses that are authorized to offer services in the park. Many offer healthy activities, such as surfing lessons, yoga workshops, and kayak tours.
